content: i inherited this pattern from my aunt who died in 1990 at the age of 103 the pattern was written out probably in the 1940 s but could be earlier i tried it out but did not have a bell to attach inside i do remember ones she d made with the bells the bells can be used as ornaments or attached to packages the sample i made used 1oz or 3g of dk weight yarn and i used #2 needles
